title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 514.4 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 514.4 - Definitions

State Regulations

For purposes of this Part: (a) Clinical Review Criteria
means the written screening policies, procedures, clinical protocols, practice
guidelines, level of care tools, and programs used by a Utilization Review

Agent to determine the medical necessity and appropriateness of a proposed
health care service for the treatment of a Mental Health Condition. (b) Office
means the New

York State Office of Mental Health. (c) Mental Health Condition
shall have the same meaning as such term is provided in sections
3216, 3221, and
4303
of the

Insurance Law. (d) Utilization Review
shall have the same meaning as such term is
provided in section
4900
of the

Public Health Law or section
4900
of the

Insurance Law, as applicable. (e) Utilization Review Agent
shall have the same meaning as such
term is provided in section
4900
of the

Public Health Law or section
4900
of the

Insurance Law, as applicable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
514.4

Adopted

New

York State Register May 15, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 20, eff. 5/15/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
